clearcontrol.core.variable

Interface VariableSyncInterface<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - reference type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundedVariable, CleanupStackVariable, DoubleVariableAsFile, EnableVariable, EnableVariable, HomingVariable, HomingVariable, MaxPositionVariable, MaxPositionVariable, MinPositionVariable, MinPositionVariable, PositionCurrentVariable, PositionTargetVariable, PositionTargetVariable, ReadyVariable, ReadyVariable, ResetVariable, ResetVariable, SingleUpdateTargetVariable, StopVariable, StopVariable, TSTBooleanVariableBase, TSTDoubleVariableBase, Variable, VariableAsFile

    public interface VariableSyncInterface<O>
    Variable sync inerface
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doNotSendAnyUpdates()
      This variable will not send updates to any other variable (but might well receive updates from other variables!)
      void doNotSendUpdatesTo(Variable<O> pVariable)
      Do not send updates (anymore) to the given variable
      void doNotSyncWith(Variable<O> pVariable)
      Stops syncing this and the given variable together.
      void sendUpdatesTo(Variable<O> pVariable)
      Sends updates to the given variable
      void syncWith(Variable<O> pVariable)
      Synced this variable with teh given variable.

    • Method Detail

      • sendUpdatesTo

        void sendUpdatesTo(Variable<O> pVariable)
        Sends updates to the given variable
        Parameters:
        pVariable - variable to send updates to

      • doNotSendUpdatesTo

        void doNotSendUpdatesTo(Variable<O> pVariable)
        Do not send updates (anymore) to the given variable
        Parameters:
        pVariable - variable not to send updates (anymore) to

      • doNotSendAnyUpdates

        void doNotSendAnyUpdates()
        This variable will not send updates to any other variable (but might well receive updates from other variables!)

      • syncWith

        void syncWith(Variable<O> pVariable)
        Synced this variable with teh given variable. This means that this and the given variable will send each other updates
        Parameters:
        pVariable - variable to cync to

      • doNotSyncWith

        void doNotSyncWith(Variable<O> pVariable)
        Stops syncing this and the given variable together.
        Parameters:
        pVariable - variable not to sync with
